text:
TOP #BPL SCORERS:
Aguero 12, 
Costa 11, 
Sanchez 8, 
Austin, Berahino 7, 
Bony, Chadli, Pelle, Sakho 6 http://t.co/zlFW2TH36M
Good news - there’s a #BPL bonus starting on Tuesday in the shape of Matchweek 14. Here’s what is coming your way… http://t.co/gtd56cFPpX
Only two players have ever scored more goals in their first 100 #BPL games than Sergio Aguero: http://t.co/bdMPtuDpee http://t.co/ZJXUovAi6N
.@NUFC are the only team yet to score in the opening 30 minutes of a #BPL match this season #BURNEW http://t.co/0N4tYLuNbr
It's tight at the top of the #BU21PL Division 1, but @ManUtd currently lead the way... http://t.co/OEQ4k9fej6
The teams are in - & #FPL managers, you still have till 1930 GMT to pick your XI! Head to http://t.co/mL6dIqG04V for all the latest...
GOAL West Brom 1-0 West Ham (10 mins). Dawson heads in from six yards, meeting Dorrans' whipped free-kick #WBAWHU
PHOTO George Boyd's sensational second goal of the season sent Burnley into half-time leading Newcastle 1-0 #BURNEW http://t.co/zGaKkWMgdh
PHOTO Back in the team & back on the scoresheet, Gerrard has put @LFC ahead. It's Leicester 1-2 Liverpool #LEILIV http://t.co/XZHCbx21yX
FULL-TIME West Brom 1-2 West Ham. The Hammers come from behind to win for the second time in four days #WBAWHU http://t.co/PxjiTwtevS
"Mathematically we can still be champions but it will be very difficult" - Van Gaal after @ManUtd's win against Stoke http://t.co/n064NScfTD
Burnley 1-1 Newcastle: @CissePapiss has more #BPL goals (5) than starts (4) this season #BURNEW http://t.co/WTDe4ZWrPN
The Duke Of Cambridge will see a new monument unveiled as part of #FootballRemembers. More: http://t.co/sQH42B6YU6 http://t.co/SZ8M0wZeIZ
TEAM NEWS Erik Lamela replaces Roberto Soldado for @SpursOfficial; Didier Drogba in for the suspended Diego Costa for @chelseafc #CHETOT
GOAL Chelsea 1-0 Spurs (19 mins) Eden Hazard exchanges passes with Didier Drogba before firing past Hugo Lloris from close range #CHETOT

We are under way in the second half. Latest: 
Chelsea 2-0 Spurs
Arsenal 0-0 Southampton
Sunderland 1-2 Man City
Everton 1-0 Hull
GOAL Arsenal 1-0 Southampton (89 mins) Alexis Sanchez breaks the deadlock, slotting in from Ramsey's pull-back #ARSSOU
Eden Hazard: "We created a lot of chances and scored three beautiful goals." #CHETOT http://t.co/lhe2FugGoM
Everton 1-1 Hull. Aluko's equaliser lifts the visitors out of the bottom 3. Full report: http://t.co/waRiuhMWKN http://t.co/oKQT9q9drv
SUPER SERGIO @aguerosergiokun has now scored 30 goals in his last 33 #BPL appearances #SUNMCI http://t.co/LXp0gTZrxP
WATCH Before #BPL Matchweek 15, enjoy all the action from the same fixtures last season. What will happen this time? http://t.co/iaovuLp27O
Relive @NUFC's most recent win and remind yourself of how the rest of Matchweek 15's fixtures panned out last season: http://t.co/x3RpHJFDP5
WATCH Sunderland are yet to win at Anfield in the #BPL era - what will happen on Saturday? All the stats: http://t.co/e22FJYuSU0
TOP SCORERS But the player who will get the most goals this weekend is _______? http://t.co/iIVtgOl02g
RESULT The votes have been counted & here's what you think about @chelseafc's chance of an unbeaten #BPL campaign... http://t.co/CobvFYr9NA
HALF-TIME Newcastle 0-0 Chelsea. @chelseafc have had more possession and attempts but it's currently level #NEWCHE http://t.co/Tv6oW0L1my
GOAL Newcastle 2-1 Chelsea (83 mins). Late drama at St James' - sub Didier Drogba heads in Cesc Fabregas' free-kick to pull one back #NEWCHE

#BPL TOP SCORERS
14 - Aguero
11 - Costa
9 - Sanchez
7 - Austin, Berahino, Cisse http://t.co/yf8fBnxAII
GOAL Stoke 3-0 Arsenal (45+1 mins). Walters slams home from close range from a corner to cap a memorable first half for the hosts #STKARS
RED CARD Moments after giving his side a 2-0 lead, Charlie Austin has been sent off for a second yellow card. QPR 2-0 Burnley (77 mins)

ALL-TIME #BPL TABLE
1 Man Utd: Pld 862, Pts 1841
2 Arsenal: Pld 863, Pts 1624
3 Chelsea: Pld 863, Pts 1595
4 Liverpool: Pld 863, Pts 1500
PHOTO @MCFC and @Everton create "A Moment in History" before kick-off: http://t.co/gELva2ooTz #FootballRemembers http://t.co/2dpDat8VUE
FULL-TIME Man City 1-0 Everton. @YayaToure's penalty closes the gap at the top of the #BPL table to 3 points #MCIEVE http://t.co/dYHqg6zZzT
Hull 0-0 West Brom. Allan McGregor has saved all 3 of the penalties he has faced in the #BPL: http://t.co/jE7DukXEVj http://t.co/HcA7ECTsA8
WATCH “We’ve got the best group of young players we’ve ever had at this club” - Alan Pardew on @NUFC's victory: http://t.co/xAfq9ROlcO
Here's how Saturday unfolded in the #BPL - reports, reaction and stats at http://t.co/5XVaYnilyk http://t.co/Q088mqFIy7
.@whufc_official keeper @AdriSanMiguel: "I have confidence in my defence - I think we can stop Wilfried Bony" #WHUSWA http://t.co/zDrhIdnbCy
SECOND HALF @whufc_official bring on @iamdiafrasakho for @EnnerValencia14 as we get back under way. West Ham 1-1 Swansea #WHUSWA
GOAL West Ham 3-1 Swansea (87 mins). @iamdiafrasakho surges through on goal after Carroll's knock-down and slams past Tremmel #WHUSWA
PHOTO @C_Clark_6 celebrates his equaliser for @AVFCOfficial. It's Aston Villa 1-1 Leicester (44 mins) #AVLLEI http://t.co/ohMBNbSYqj
RED CARD Paul Konchesky is dismissed for Leicester after an altercation with Alan Hutton on 80 mins. Villa 2-1 Leicester #AVLLEI
